title: How to Copy a Link on an iPhone

steps.title: Tap and hold the link.
steps.content: Tap and hold the link. A menu will appear. If you try to copy a website address that isn’t a clickable link, you’ll notice that part of the URL is now highlighted. Select the entire URL by dragging the left slider to its beginning, and the right slider to its end.

steps.title: Tap Copy.
steps.content: Tap Copy . The web address is now copied to your clipboard.

steps.title: Paste the link.
steps.content: Paste the link. You can paste the link in almost any app or document. To do so, tap and hold the typing area until a menu appears, and then tap Paste .
